argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x y

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | invfval.b | |- B = ( Base ` C ) |
| 2 |  | invfval.n | |- N = ( Inv ` C ) |
| 3 |  | invfval.c | |- ( ph -> C e. Cat ) |
| 4 |  | invfval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 5 |  | invfval.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 6 |  | invfval.s | |- S = ( Sect ` C ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 4, 6 | #P_invffval | |- ( ph -> N = ( x e. B , y e. B |-> ( ( x S y ) i^i `' ( y S x ) ) ) ) |
| 8 |  | #P_simprl | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> x = X ) |
| 9 |  | #P_simprr | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> y = Y ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> ( x S y ) = ( X S Y ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 8 | #P_oveq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> ( y S x ) = ( Y S X ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_cnveqd | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> `' ( y S x ) = `' ( Y S X ) ) |
| 13 | 10, 12 | #P_ineq12d | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x = X /\ y = Y ) ) -> ( ( x S y ) i^i `' ( y S x ) ) = ( ( X S Y ) i^i `' ( Y S X ) ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( X S Y ) e. _V |
| 15 | 14 | #P_inex1 | |- ( ( X S Y ) i^i `' ( Y S X ) ) e. _V |
| 16 | 15 | #P_a1i | |- ( ph -> ( ( X S Y ) i^i `' ( Y S X ) ) e. _V ) |
| 17 | 7, 13, 4, 5, 16 | #P_ovmpt2d | |- ( ph -> ( X N Y ) = ( ( X S Y ) i^i `' ( Y S X ) ) ) |
